Package pageManagement

Class DiscussionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • pageManagement.DiscussionController
  • public class DiscussionController
extends java.util.Observable
    Class handling the JavaFX objects from the Discussion scene (defined in discussion.fxml).

        public static java.lang.String formatDateFromString​(java.lang.String dateString)
        Formats a date string in a relevant way for the group messages.
        Parameters:
        dateString - The complete date string to format (example : "Wed Apr 07 16:29:19 CEST 2021")
        Returns:
        The formatted date string (associated example : "Le 07/04 à 16h29")

      • actionExitButton

        private void actionExitButton()
        Action linked to the "Quitter" JFXButton. Leaves the current Discussions page, then switches to the Home scene.
